name: Flying Birdie
description:
Flying Birdie

This is a simple Flappy Bird like game.
Keep the birdie flying for as long as you can, avoiding the pipes.

You can change the color of the birdie by clicking the "star" button in the main menu.

Playable on the browser, and can also be downloaded for Windows, Linux and Android.

Controls

  • Flap the wings: press Space or Enter on the keyboard, A on the joystick, or click or touch the screen.
  • Exit to the main menu: press Escape on the keyboard, Start on the joystick or click or touch the "II" button on the top left corner.
  • Toggle fullscreen: press F11 on the keyboard, or click or touch on the respective button in the main menu.
External tools and assets used Click to show
